turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good. I need to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what starbucks would you like to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: order of the one that's in near a zip code 64503.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need a need to order caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need just skimmed milk added to it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ay whipped cream or add ons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing else. Just just the skim milk in it, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande cafe americano with skim milk from the starbucks on downs drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a receipt via text.
